Title: Combat Reference
Rules_Text:
Combat Reference
----------
Both sides roll 1d6 & apply effects simultaneously.  

Player:
1 Miss (No hit)
2 Block (Block all incoming)
3 Hit (1 DMG)  
4 Hit (1 DMG)  
5 Critical (2 DMG)  
6 Hit (1 DMG)

Title: Guardian
Rules_Text:
FINAL BOSS FIGHT: 20 HP
----------
The Guardian is invulnerable unless struck with the Ancient Sword
(Without Ancient Sword, you cannot damage the Guardian)

THE THREE SEALS (must be broken to defeat the Guardian):

SEAL OF APORIA (Ignorance): Cannot cross the Nightsea to reach Guardian
- Break: The Sage must use Ferryman's Bell for Night Sea Crossing

SEAL OF ACEDIA (Sloth): Guardian heals all damage at end of each round
- Break: Mirror Knight companion must be following you

SEAL OF AGNOSIA (Unknowing): When you deal damage, take that damage instead
- Break: Ghostly Princess companion must be following you

GUARDIAN COMBAT TABLE (1d6):
1 Eclipse Roar (-1 to next Player roll)
2 Shadow Gale (Block & 1 DMG; you skip your next roll)
3 Gloaming Wave (2 DMG; no rerolls next round)
4 Corona Radiation (3 DMG)
5 Devour (3 DMG, ignore Block)
6 Black Zenith (Block & 3 DMG)

Title: Home Village Termina
Flavor_Text: Termina’s orchards are seized by Valthria; fields salted, parents buried; you vow vengeance.

Title: Smoke along the lanes
Flavor_Text: Ash drifts; names taste like cinder.

Title: Parents slain by Magistrate Ellard
Flavor_Text: Ellard’s decree ends in blood; grief hardens into purpose.
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 7 HP
or
Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: Keep vigil at their graves
Flavor_Text: You rest by new earth, whispering promises to the dead.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Gravel under vow
Flavor_Text: Each step repeats the promise without words.

Title: Ravenous Boar
Flavor_Text: You wake to tusks and fury in the ruined orchard.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 5 HP
----------
1 Miss
2 Miss
3 Ram (1 DMG) 
4 Gore (1 DMG)
5 Gore (1 DMG)
6 Trample (1 DMG)

Title: Rations
Flavor_Text: You gather what the raiders missed—bread, apples, salt.

Title: Homespun cloak
Flavor_Text: Woven by Mother's hand. Smells of smoke and cider.

Title: Stench of piled bodies
Flavor_Text: The reek gnaws at resolve; every breath remembers.

Title: Cold hearth shadows
Flavor_Text: Stone remembers warmth, not the why.

Title: Orchard rows at dusk
Flavor_Text: Trees hold still as if listening.

Title: Moon on the well
Flavor_Text: A circle of light steadies your breath.

Title: Torches gutter on empty street
Flavor_Text: Night edits the day to essentials.

Title: Keeping downwind
Flavor_Text: You move with the smoke instead of through it.

Title: Back stairs holding breath
Flavor_Text: Wood does not argue with careful feet.

Title: Infiltrate the Magistrate’s manor
Flavor_Text: If you fail, turned villagers force a terrible choice.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 3+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 2 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Confront Ellard and his lackeys
Flavor_Text: Power bows to cruelty—until you make it otherwise.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 3 HP
----------
1 Miss
2 Miss
3 Pitchfork (1 DMG) 
4 Torch (1 DMG)
5 Kris (1 DMG)
6 Cower

Title: Liberation, but ashes remain
Flavor_Text: Nothing left to keep you; only resolve to go forward.
Rules_Text:
EFFECT:
Cleanse 1 Snare
&
Gain +1 to Player rolls next Duel

Title: Dawn over blackened rows
Flavor_Text: Light finds what ash could not.

Title: Forgotten Shrine
Flavor_Text: Lightning outlines ruins; a stair yawns downward into old stone.

Title: Providential shelter
Flavor_Text: Dry stone, found by chance—or design.

Title: Steps into the nave
Flavor_Text: Echoes learn your name and let it fade.

Title: Trapped hallway
Flavor_Text: Mechanisms still remember intruders.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 3+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 2 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Dust wakes
Flavor_Text: Fingerprints teach the corridor a new story.

Title: Supernatural darkness
Flavor_Text: Light dies mid-air; the dark has weight.
Rules_Text:
EFFECT: 
Automatic miss first 2 attacks each combat

Title: Flame stutters
Flavor_Text: Light shrinks, patience grows.

Title: Crushing silence of the Grand Cathedral
Flavor_Text: Answerless nave, breath held by centuries.
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 7 HP
or
Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: Arches counting
Flavor_Text: You become a number the ruin can accept.

Title: Ritual water basin
Flavor_Text: Cold as truth; eyes clear when you touch it.

Title: Water ring on stone
Flavor_Text: Ripples measure a silence you can stand in.

Title: Wraithwing Moth
Flavor_Text: Dust like winter; wings hum like lost vows.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 5 HP
----------
1 Miss
2 Flutter (Block) 
3 Evade (Block) 
4 Toxic dust (1 DMG) 
5 Wing buffet (1 DMG)
6 Body slam (2 DMG)

Title: Draft carries an old hymn
Flavor_Text: You do not sing; you keep time.

Title: Ancient Sword
Flavor_Text: Light between shadows

Title: Carvings in pale glow
Flavor_Text: Meaning chooses to arrive later.

Title: Assailed by living shadows
Flavor_Text: They test what the storm already found wanting.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 3 HP
----------
1 Miss 
2 Miss
3 Unnerve (1 DMG) 
4 Scrape (1 DMG)
5 Cold embrace (2 DMG)
6 Dark claw (2 DMG)

Title: Candles take and hold
Flavor_Text: Small fires barter with the dark.

Title: Dust settles like blessing
Flavor_Text: Stillness becomes permission.

Title: Candles and pews till morning
Flavor_Text: Wax, wood, heartbeat; dawn negotiates your return.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Bannered City Valthria
Flavor_Text: Valthria—annexed sprawl where status is law and waste its shadow.

Title: City Watch shakedown
Flavor_Text: Pay, talk, or vanish into paperwork.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 3+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 2 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Gate queue shuffles
Flavor_Text: Boots, stamps, and sighs share a beat.

Title: Vast markets
Flavor_Text: A thousand cries; a thousand prices on the same soul.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Papers folded flat
Flavor_Text: You keep your face the way walls do.

Title: Intoxicating spices
Flavor_Text: Scent blinds judgment; excess wears a smile.

Title: Alleys braid and unbraid
Flavor_Text: Corners practice misdirection for sport.

Title: Moonleaf Brandy
Flavor_Text: Warm courage in a bottle; debts arrive later.
Rules_Text:
USE:
Heal 7 HP, then lose 1d6 HP

Title: Street vendor chorus
Flavor_Text: Calls weave through you and keep going.

Title: Assassin in the crowd
Flavor_Text: Steel learns your name between two heartbeats.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 3 HP
----------
1 Dodge (Evade)
2 Slice (1 DMG) 
3 Pierce (2 DMG) 
4 Subvert (2 DMG)
5 Eviscerate (2 DMG)
6 Riposte (Block & 1 DMG)

Title: Faces blur in the crowd
Flavor_Text: You prefer it that way for now.

Title: Out of your depth
Flavor_Text: Vulnerability exposed beneath banners and gold.
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 7 HP
or
Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: Eyes on the banners
Flavor_Text: You practice being less than a question.

Title: Refuse Ooze
Flavor_Text: City’s sins congeal and reach for you.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 5 HP
----------
1 Sludge (Miss)
2 Creep (Miss) 
3 Murk (Miss) 
4 Toxic burn (3 DMG)
5 Rip (3 DMG)
6 Autophagy (Heal self 1 HP)

Title: Gutter water finds a drain
Flavor_Text: You follow the downhill logic.

Title: Golden bangle
Flavor_Text: Warmth remembered in gold.

Title: Steps match the bells
Flavor_Text: Time is public; you are passing through.

Title: Coins click like rain
Flavor_Text: Value passes through without staying.

Title: Humility
Flavor_Text: Smallness becomes sight; you pass gate to gate.
Rules_Text:
EFFECT:
Cleanse 1 Snare
&
Gain +1 to Player rolls next Duel

Title: The Caelith Spiremaze
Flavor_Text: Spire upon spire; answers drift like dreams.

Title: Labyrinthine ascent
Flavor_Text: Stairs lie; corridors argue; you get lost anyway.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 3+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 2 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Stairs that disagree
Flavor_Text: Up and down negotiate underfoot.

Title: Constellation shaped like a sword
Flavor_Text: Stars arrange themselves as if remembering you.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Star-lines rehearsed
Flavor_Text: Constellations suggest a route without insisting.

Title: Damsel in a distant tower
Flavor_Text: Is rescue possible, or only pursuit?
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 8 HP
or 
move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: High light
Flavor_Text: far away

Title: Psychic malaise of questions
Flavor_Text: Doubt multiplies like hallways.

Title: Questions thin to wind
Flavor_Text: You walk anyway; it approves.

Title: Mirror shard on a pedestal
Flavor_Text: It shows the cut between who you are and could be.

Title: Palm lines itch with choices
Flavor_Text: You close your hand and keep moving.

Title: Spectral lantern
Flavor_Text: Cold flame that lights only the honest path.
Rules_Text:
EQUIP:
Once per location, peek at 2 face down cards
Turn sideways to track use

Title: Cold light at an arch
Flavor_Text: Edges glow where paths decide.

Title: Ghostly Princess
Flavor_Text: The bangle remembers her pulse; She follows like a moon
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Give Golden Bangle: Ghostly Princess follows you
OR
Discard this card: She fades forever

Title: Footfalls find a second rhythm
Flavor_Text: Something unseen keeps pace without promise.

Title: Scholarly sphinx at the exit
Flavor_Text: Riddles with claws; doctrine with teeth.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 7 HP
----------
1 Dissociate (Miss)
2 Rebuff (Block) 
3 Debate (2 DMG) 
4 Refute (2 DMG)
5 Deconstruct (3 DMG)
6 Slander (Block & 2 DMG)

Title: Door that was not there
Flavor_Text: You pass as if it always was.

Title: Answer one step ahead
Flavor_Text: You follow without insisting.

Title: Purpose: follow and protect
Flavor_Text: Her direction steadies your step.
Rules_Text:
EFFECT:
Cleanse 1 Snare
&
Gain +1 to Player rolls next Duel

Title: Sirocco Wastes
Flavor_Text: The wastes were empire once; now only distance rules.

Title: Four days under the red sun
Flavor_Text: It never sets; neither do you.

Title: Heat shimmer road
Flavor_Text: The air wears a mirage and you wear the air.

Title: Scattered adventuring gear (ruined)
Flavor_Text: Broken straps, sand-gnawed steel—warnings or gifts.

Title: Sand repairs your stride
Flavor_Text: Leather learns new compromises.

Title: Recovered gear pieces
Flavor_Text: Every fragment teaches economy.

Title: Sky without corners
Flavor_Text: Your shadow signs its small agreement.

Title: Sand-eaten war colossus
Flavor_Text: A battlefield remembers how to stand.

Title: Half-buried ribs
Flavor_Text: Ruins make their own horizon.

Title: Desiccating winds
Flavor_Text: Hours peel you down to intent.

Title: Wind writes in salt
Flavor_Text: You read what you need and let the rest blow.

Title: Counting to the next shade
Flavor_Text: Numbers break and you keep counting.

Title: Featureless expanse
Flavor_Text: Exile is the shape of a horizon.

Title: Mirror Knight
Flavor_Text: A reflection that cannot be defeated by force alone.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: UNWINNABLE
HP = Player HP
----------
1 Copy player roll
2 Copy player roll 
3 Copy player roll
4 Copy player roll
5 Copy player roll
6 Copy player roll

SPECIAL: Use Mirror Shard - Mirror Knight recognizes himself and follows you
(This is the only way past this encounter)

Title: Long shadow keeps pace
Flavor_Text: Distance teaches companionship without words.

Title: Wandering until treeline appears
Flavor_Text: At last, green edges the sky; night follows.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 4+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 3 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Green rumor at the edge
Flavor_Text: Hope changes color first.

Title: Night cool on cracked lips
Flavor_Text: Rest arrives as a thinner heat.

Title: Gratitude
Flavor_Text: Empty hands, lighter heart.

Title: Darkwood Brume
Flavor_Text: Mist and misdirection; meaning hides off-path.

Title: Brook in the shade
Flavor_Text: Cold water trades heat for hope.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Brook keeps slow time
Flavor_Text: You tune your breath to water.

Title: Ferns brush the knee
Flavor_Text: Touch teaches direction better than sight.

Title: Cooling moss salve
Flavor_Text: Sunburn eases; breath deepens.

Title: False trails and lost purpose
Flavor_Text: The map unhelpfully becomes you.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 4+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 3 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Why bother?
Flavor_Text: Fatigue argues for surrender.
Rules_Text:
EFFECT: 
Lose 2 HP every time a card is turned face up

Title: Marks blur to nothing
Flavor_Text: The forest edits your certainty.

Title: Paths suggest detours
Flavor_Text: You nod politely and continue.

Title: Fine threads on your sleeve
Flavor_Text: You prefer not to know their maker.

Title: Mist-spun giant spider
Flavor_Text: You cut vapor and find venom.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 7 HP
----------
1 Dissipate (Miss)
2 Veil (Block)
3 Filament Lash (2 DMG)
4 Needle Bite (2 DMG)
5 Envenom (1 DMG & +1 DMG rest of fight)
6 Fog-Feint (Block & 2 DMG)

Title: After victory, pointlessness lingers
Flavor_Text: Meaning hides behind the next step.
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 8 HP
or 
move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: The Sage
Flavor_Text: A robed figure steps from the mist. He nods once, then follows.
Rules_Text:
ENCOUNTER:
The Sage follows you

NIGHT SEA CROSSING:
If The Sage has Ferryman's Bell, you may cross the Nightsea Expanse to reach the Guardian

Title: Fog blinks first
Flavor_Text: You take the path that opens an eye.

Title: Footsteps ahead
Flavor_Text: unclaimed

Title: Sunstone
Flavor_Text: With it, you walk out of the fog.
Rules_Text:
EQUIP:
Once per location, turn 2 cards face up
Turn sideways to track use

Title: Light thickens then thins
Flavor_Text: Somewhere is nearer than it was.

Title: Trail brightens by degrees
Flavor_Text: Seeing is a verb you remember.

Title: Guidance
Flavor_Text: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Rules_Text:
EFFECT:
Cleanse 1 Snare 
& 
+1 to Player rolls next CHALLENGE

Title: Amara Rot Glade
Flavor_Text: Resentment blooms among red rot and biting flies.

Title: Black-thorn sap
Flavor_Text: Poison or remedy depends on the hand.

Title: Thorns watching
Flavor_Text: You pass like an apology through green teeth.

Title: Tar pits and crimson vines
Flavor_Text: Every step negotiates with hunger.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 5+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 3 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Step lifts
Flavor_Text: step sinks

Title: Gravecoil Ambusher
Flavor_Text: Death coils; patience tightens.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 7 HP
----------
1 Slack (Miss)
2 Grave Scutes (Block)
3 Bonebind Constrict (1 DMG & Player skips next roll)
4 Carrion Bite (3 DMG)
5 Rot-Venom (3 DMG & +1 DMG rest of fight)
6 Undying Coil (Block & 4 DMG)

Title: Still water listens
Flavor_Text: You keep your secrets for the shore.

Title: Drowning ambush
Flavor_Text: Her plea was bait; your mercy almost fatal.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 5 HP
----------
1 Trudge (Miss)
2 Collapsed veins (Block)
3 Dredge (2 DMG) 
4 Drown (1 DMG & Player skips next roll)
5 Strangle (2 DMG & Player skips next roll)
6 Howl (2 DMG & Player skips next roll)

Title: Mud rinsed from hands
Flavor_Text: Clean is a direction, not a state.

Title: Betrayal shock
Flavor_Text: Trust cracks like peat underfoot.
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 8 HP
or 
move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: Eyes on the banks
Flavor_Text: Patience lives here and notices everything.

Title: Bleeding-heart talisman
Flavor_Text: Heightened awareness through rot and snare.

Title: Caution widens
Flavor_Text: Your circle of attention grows a second edge.

Title: Pity for the fallen
Flavor_Text: Compassion keeps you from becoming the swamp.
Rules_Text:
EFFECT:
Cleanse 1 Snare 
& 
+2 to next Heal

Title: Air sweetens toward mercy
Flavor_Text: Bitterness remembers to breathe out.

Title: Gnats sketch circles
Flavor_Text: The itch reminds you to move.

Title: Rot offers passage
Flavor_Text: You accept the cost and go.

Title: Lay her to rest
Flavor_Text: You bury her with a flower; bitterness loosens.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Fracturing ice floor
Flavor_Text: Each step auditions catastrophe.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 5+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 3 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Crack-lines underfoot
Flavor_Text: You map by sound more than sight.

Title: Wardens ice shield
Flavor_Text: Sees what watches; refuses to be seen.

Title: Cold ward of silence
Flavor_Text: You choose not to disturb the held breath.

Title: Panopticon isolation
Flavor_Text: You feel watched by everyone and no one.

Title: No gaze finds you
Flavor_Text: You practice being ordinary as ice.

Title: Frosted garden rest
Flavor_Text: Hoarfrost petals, a bench of silence.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Bench of frost
Flavor_Text: Rest is an agreement with the cold.

Title: Judgment like a draft
Flavor_Text: It passes through; you keep your warmth.

Title: Life under judgment
Flavor_Text: Freedom a rumor; you a supporting role.
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 8 HP
or 
move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: Thyra, the Warden
Flavor_Text: At the center, authority shivers.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 5 HP
----------
1 Ram (Block) 
2 Shield (Block) 
3 Stasis chain (Player skips next roll) 
4 Rime blast (3 DMG)
5 Ice spear (3 DMG)
6 Impale (3 DMG)

Title: Bridge whitening with rime
Flavor_Text: Edges blur; balance does not.

Title: Great white wolf
Flavor_Text: It guards the fall; snow learns your color.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 7 HP
----------
1 Whiteout Stalk (Miss; next hit +1 DMG)
2 Iceback (Block)
3 Pounce (1 DMG & Player skips next roll)
4 Fang (3 DMG)
5 Hamstring (3 DMG & no rerolls next round)
6 Winter Howl (Block & 2 DMG)

Title: White hush
Flavor_Text: wide as a hall

Title: Snow-Melt Tear
Flavor_Text: Cold that frees bars behind the throne.

Title: Passage breath clouds ahead
Flavor_Text: The way accepts your warmth and yields.

Title: Keys ring somewhere far
Flavor_Text: Patience wears a coat of frost.

Title: Melted way out
Flavor_Text: A hidden tunnel descends toward freedom.

Title: Find the underground river
Flavor_Text: A cavern river leads deeper, then becomes an underground sea.
Rules_Text:
REST:
Spend 1 Resolve to gain 1 Grace
OR
Spend 1 Resolve to heal 5 HP

Title: Boat skims the dark
Flavor_Text: The current sets the sentence; you provide the verb.

Title: Eroding sense of self
Flavor_Text: What remains?

Title: Self in the oar rhythm
Flavor_Text: Repetition forgets your edges.

Title: Ferryman's Bell
Flavor_Text: Ancient bronze; silent until needed.
Rules_Text:
EQUIP:
Once per combat, reroll any single die

Title: Oar dips
Flavor_Text: current answers

Title: Austere Leviathan
Flavor_Text: A mountain of intent rises beneath your keel.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 7 HP
----------
1 Sounding (Miss & +1 DMG next Breach)
2 Keelshadow (Block)
3 Undertow Drag (1 DMG & +1 DMG next Breach)
4 Wake Wall (1 DMG & +1 DMG next Breach)
5 Pressure Fold (2 DMG)
6 Breach (5 DMG)

Title: Pearl of opal dawn
Flavor_Text: Drowned dawn trapped in stone.
Rules_Text:
USE:
Move the Resolve/Dread marker up to 2 steps toward Resolve

Title: Wake stitches a path
Flavor_Text: Thread behind, question ahead.

Title: Horizon is a sound
Flavor_Text: You listen until it becomes direction.

Title: Water decides twice
Flavor_Text: Circles open when you stop arguing.

Title: Transmuted whirlpool
Flavor_Text: The sea reconsiders your path into a circle.
Rules_Text:
CHALLENGE:
Roll 1d6, Target: 5+, need 3 successes before 3 failures.
Each failure: Lose 3 HP.
On 3 failures: Move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1.

Title: Abyssal unreality
Flavor_Text: You travel timelessly; what is sloughs off like scales.
Rules_Text:
CHOOSE:
Lose 8 HP
or 
move the Resolve/Dread marker down 1

Title: Aeron the Half-Changed
Flavor_Text: Beached between selves; you finish the choice he would not.
Rules_Text:
FIGHT: 5 HP
----------
1 Wild swing (Miss) 
2 Blink (Block) 
3 Duelists carve (3 DMG) 
4 Silent shout (3 DMG)
5 Aura of pain (3 DMG)
6 Rending sorrow (3 DMG)

Title: Silence with weight
Flavor_Text: Depth measures you back.

Title: Rock rises
Flavor_Text: then sinks

Title: Acceptance
Flavor_Text: You sail on without guarantees; that is the door.

Title: Phosphor wakes in the wake
Flavor_Text: Small lights agree to travel.
